attributes.action: Legalise Marijuana (Skunk Should Be Illegal Due To High Thc)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is to call for the Legalising and declassifying of marijuana tho the strain skunk should be classed as illegal drug due to high thc using this drug has shown signs of helping ill people e.g pepole with m.s. t.b. and alot of other illneses amd it has showing a relax in people who whould other wise get drunk and then go out on street to fight unlike people who like to smoke marijuana including hash to watch a bit of t.v. with a splif and/or bong then dinner and bed but the people who drink to much like to drink drink drink go out have a fight the police are out wasting public money to aresst pepole for basic asbo's but the case with people who smoke marijuana relax and chill
